about_the_game:
CARnage is a classic top-down arcade combat racing game set in a dystopian future.

Grow your garage and earn money through racing and upgrade your rides to explore the different worlds of CARnage.

Levels

Experience 46 levels spanning over 3 distinct worlds.

Cars

Unlock new cars through out your adventures and find your preferred style to survive the Apocalypse.

Power-ups

Pick up power-ups during your race to get an edge against your opponents, make sure to armor up as your foes will have the same weapons at hand.

Tournaments

Unlock the CARnage tournaments to win special vehicles for interesting driving experiences.

Customize

Win Bolt-ons and Paintjobs from races to customize your rides to your enjoyment and needs.

Split-screen Multiplayer

Race against your friends with up to 4 player split-screen locally or through Steam Remote Play Together.



CARnage comes with a wide variety of customization options, mainly you can grow your garage with a selection of vehicles spanning from cool to ridiculous

You can upgrade each cars engine, wheels, gearbox, suspension and armor as well as distribute bolt-ons that give you the extra edge needed to survive the apocalypse



And make sure to paint your ride in your favorite color to feel amazing whilst crushing your opponents in the all-out warfare of tomorrow!



You wake up to the rumble of car engines, disoriented and without any memories on how you ended up in this car.

You do know that winning the race you apparently are in is your only hope to figure out where you are and how to get your memories back.

Survive the CARnage using weapons and the environment to your advantage!



And make sure to stay away from the horrors that your opponents and tracks throw at you...

content_descriptors.notes: Contains characters with mildly revealing outfits and light use of foul language and profanity. Some characters give a glorified view on violence.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 Dual Core or Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970, RX 570 or similar
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: A top-down arcade combat racing game that celebrates the classic 2d racing games of old. Upgrade and expand your garage of vehicles to survive the dystopian future that is CARnage.
